title: Varun Haridas | Junior AI Engineer
name: Varun Haridas
bio: Early-career AI engineer with hands-on experience architecting real-time data pipelines and scalable web applications to operationalize machine-learning solutions. Proven ability to integrate MQTT-based telemetry, design RESTful APIs, and optimize system stability for monitoring platforms. Passionate about deploying computer-vision models and LLM-powered features in production environments.
